UPDATE PLACE SET PLACE_COUNT = PLACE_COUNT +1 WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLACE WHERE LOCAL_NAME = ?
SELECT AT_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO=? AND FILE_TYPE=2

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE CATEGORY_NO=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO=1 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO PLAYER VALUES( SEQ_PLAYER.NEXTVAL, ?, (SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE TIME_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?,'YY/MM/DD')), DEFAULT )

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLAYER WHERE USER_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_NO IN (SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE TIME_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD') AND FIXED_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO ,M.USER_NICKNAME ,R.SCORE ,R.REVIEW_CONTENT ,R.CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN PLAYER P ON R.PLAYER_NO = P.PLAYER_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN RESERVATION E ON P.RESERVATION_NO = E.RESERVATION_NO JOIN PLACE L ON E.PLACE_NO = L.PLACE_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.PLACE_NO = ?
